column4: hi everyone ^^, is there a way to change my user ID in ubuntu ?
okay let's say i want to change my username , the homefolder name ,, and all .. like a username in a fresh install .. what do i do ?
Sober, no no .. just change the name ^^
i'm not an expert ,, can you tell me the whole command ?
how do i logout and put the command ?
loool .. i suck more than u do :P
or just set root password, but i don't think it'd be good for you :f
